description:
Part of Fjallraven’s lightweight, summer trekking collection the Abisko Hike shirt is great for travelling in warmer climates, or any casual days with a chance of adventure.

  • Soft, packable nylon wicks away moisture and feels cools against your skin
  • Ventilation at the rear yoke
  • Zippered chest pocket has a mesh liner
  • Regular fit wears like an old favourite
name: Fjallraven Abisko Hike Shirt Short Sleeve - Men's
